item.title: How to Create a Family Budget That Actually Works
item.description: When you boil it down, creating a family budget is about four things: agreeing on your financial goals together, figuring out your total household income, tracking where your money is actually going, and then creating a realistic monthly plan based on that info. It’s how you turn a free-for-all into a team sport, cutting down on stress and putting you both back in the driver’s seat.
